lead_paragraph: China Rongsheng Heavy Industries, the largest Chinese shipbuilder outside state control, is seeking $2.3 billion in what could be Hong Kong's third-largest initial public offering this year, Bloomberg News said, citing terms sent to investors.
snippet: China Rongsheng Heavy Industries, China's largest shipbuilder outside state control, is seeking $2.3 billion in what may be Hong Kong's third-largest initial public offering this year, Bloomberg News said, citing terms sent to investors.

headline.main: China Rongsheng Aims for $2.3 Billion Hong Kong I.P.O.

abstract: China Rongsheng Heavy Industries, China's largest shipbuilder outside state control, is seeking $2.3 billion in what may be Hong Kong's third-largest initial public offering this year, Bloomberg News said, citing terms sent to investors.
